wybug_title: 17173多个站数据库报错致敏感信息泄露

wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2012-04-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2012-04-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 数据库报错致敏感信息泄露等等。貌似存在注入，你们看一下吧，网速不给力，卡的要死。亲，上传图片好慢的，能否考虑加个批量上图？？ 详细说明：  http://aion.17173.com/xqly/01.shtmlWarning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Host '10.59.96.9' is not allowed to connect to this MySQL server in/home/httpd/html/board.news.17173.com/include/db.php on line 32Warning: mysql_close(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL-Link resource in /home/httpd/html/board.news.17173.com/include/db.php on line 59数据库暂时无法连接，请稍候…… http://moyu.17173.com/zt/ynz071015/index.shtmlWarning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Host '10.59.96.9' is not allowed to connect to this MySQL server in/home/httpd/html/board.news.17173.com/include/db.php on line 32Warning: mysql_close(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL-Link resource in/home/httpd/html/board.news.17173.com/include/db.php on line 59数据库暂时无法连接，请稍候……http://moyu.17173.com/leaveword/more.html Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Host '10.59.96.9' is not allowed to connect to this MySQL server in/home/httpd/html/board.news.17173.com/include/db.php on line 32Warning: mysql_close(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL-Link resource in/home/httpd/html/board.news.17173.com/include/db.php on line 59数据库暂时无法连接，请稍候…… http://tera.17173.com/xqly/02.shtml http://act.17173.com/2010/12/sp1224/show.phpconnect error:Lost connection to MySQL server at 'reading initial communication packet', system error: 111http://act.17173.com/2010/03/tl0316/index.php http://act.17173.com/2010/04/qnyh0401/index.php http://act.17173.com/2010/09/cqsn0901/show.php http://act.17173.com/2010/02/mhzx0209/mjoin.php   漏洞证明：
